heroText: Your interactive map and guide through the most important events in history. Travel through time, discover fascinating stories, and learn in a completely new way.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.welcome: Welcome to the history reading app. By using our application, you accept the terms of use stated in this document. Please read all items carefully before using the app.
terms.section1Text: Our app provides an interactive map of the ancient world around the Mediterranean ‚Äì Europe, North Africa, and the Middle East with Mesopotamia. The map highlights key locations with events and battles that users can explore. Clicking on a location opens a modal with detailed information about the event.
terms.section2Text: Users have the ability to choose a time cycle (Stone Age, Bronze Age, Early Antiquity, etc.). This filters the events and locations displayed on the map.
